data.seriesDescription: Total Energy CO2 Emissions in Million Metric Tons of Carbon Dioxide
data.unit: Million Metric Tons of Carbon Dioxide

response.description: These data represent the most recent comprehensive energy statistics integrated across all energy sources.  The data includes total energy production, consumption, stocks, and trade; energy prices; overviews of petroleum, natural gas, coal, electricity, nuclear energy, renewable energy, and carbon dioxide emissions; and data unit conversions values.  Source: https://www.eia.gov/totalenergy/data/monthly/pdf/mer_a_doc.pdf  Report:  MER (https://www.eia.gov/totalenergy/data/monthly/)
